schema.title: Response List Wins Slot Win Get
Response Create Wins Slot Win Post
Response List Wins By User Slot Win By User  User Id  Get
Response List Prizes Slot Prize Get
Response List Vouchers Slot Voucher Get

put.description:
Modify the total games count of a voucher.
Query parameters:
- add: increment total_games by this amount
- decrease: decrement total_games by this amount
- set: set total_games to this exact value
Returns 404 if voucher not found.

Use a game from the voucher. Decrements remaining games by 1.
Returns 404 if voucher not found or has no remaining games.

post.description:
DEPRECATED: Use PUT /{voucher_id}/play instead.
This endpoint is kept for backwards compatibility.
Create a new voucher message record (when DM is sent to user)

get.description:
List voucher messages.
Query parameters:
- user_id: filter by user ID
- voucher_code: filter by voucher code
- active_only: if 1, only return records with deleted_at IS NULL (default 1)
- limit, offset: pagination

schema.title: Response List Voucher Messages Slot Voucher Messages Get

delete.description: Mark voucher message record as deleted (soft delete)
